text: Lacuna is the debut studio album by English band Childhood. It was released on 11 August 2014 under Marathon Artists. ==Critical reception== Lacuna was met with generally favorable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 68, based on 11 reviews. ===Accolades=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |+ Accolades for Lacuna !
